answers.answer: I also failed the one hour test and passed the three hour test. Don't worry its very common!

I also failed the one hour and passed the three hour.  Just don't eat any starchy foods the night before it turns to sugar the next day and could mess up the test. That's what happened to me when I done my one hour I ate mashed potatoes Mac and cheese corn and meat the night before. Lol. You should be fine I wouldn't worry. Good luck.
It's common, I failed the hr one and passed the 3 hr one. Try not to worry. Although I know how it feels to have it on ur mind and be stressing over it!!Good luck (: u will be fine!

I was gestational diabetic with my first child and I am also gestational diabetic with my second child now. Everything is fine. Your doctor will send you to a specialist to keep your sugar under control. I keep mine under control with just diet. My daughter is now 3yrs going to be 4yrs in February and she is fine and healthy. I am now 36 weeks and 3 days and my son is doing fine.

question: I failed my first test and now I have to go back for the 3 hour test. I'm totally freaked out because some websites say that my baby could be stillborn. Is that just if it's left untreated? I'm 26 weeks along and I just want everything to be ok! Any calming words you guys can offer?
title: gestational diabetes
